review.title: “A place where you feel passionate about all that you do”
review.pros: Pros – The culture is wonderful and the people are amazing. Feels like home. I enjoy every bit of being here. Its wonderful
review.cons: Cons – Wish that I had more hrs in a day to spend at WNP. Its all about igniting passion in all that we do.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – wonderful to be a part of this vibrant company

review.title: “Amazing Opportunity to grow and flourish”
review.pros: Pros – It is a soft skills and outdoor training company. The benefits of working here are manifold. You get to learn the lessons of leadership and management practically while working on the ground and roughing it out against Mother Nature.The work environment is very casual and the senior management is amiable. Not only do you get ample opportunities to showcase your talent here , your ideas are positively received.
review.cons: Cons – The company is still it's initial phase. But it is growing at a Rapid pace
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
